user.name: Daniel Rosehill

professional_experience.title: Communications Manager
description: Led strategic communications for a pioneer in impact investing.
Key Achievement: Developed a dataset for the IFVI project that achieved almost 2,000 downloads, demonstrating impact in the field of impact accounting and open-source contribution.
Focused on social media management, video production, brief writing, and data-led storytelling.

professional_experience.title: Independent Consultant (DSR Holdings)
description: Provided technical communication, documentation, prompt engineering, and consulting services to technology companies, ranging from startups to Fortune 500s.
Focus on applying AI technologies, including LangChain, LangGraph, Gemini, OpenAI APIs, and Zapier.

professional_experience.title: Marketing Communications Manager
description: Managed communications for an IIoT (Industrial Internet of Things) company.
Focused on ghostwriting and PR activities for smart city technology.

professional_experience.title: Assistant Account Executive
description: Worked on high-tech accounts, including CRM and medical devices.
Responsibilities included media pitching and writing projects.

professional_experience.title: Marketing Communications Manager
description: Led full-stack marketing for an Irish political tech startup.
Supported the company's entry into the US market.

key_skills: Technical Communications: Creating documentation, user guides, and technical content, with a specific focus on AI-related projects and technologies.
Marketing Communications: Developing and implementing communication strategies (but seeking to apply this in an AI context).
Documentation:  Strong emphasis on creating, organizing, and maintaining documentation for complex systems, *especially* AI project development.
Prompt Engineering:  Practical experience implementing and utilizing AI tools through effective prompt design.
Content Strategy: Developing and executing content strategies (but not seeking purely "Content Writer" roles).
Stakeholder Management: Building and maintaining relationships with internal and external stakeholders.
AI-Specific Technologies: LangChain, LangGraph, Gemini, OpenAI APIs, Zapier, orchestration and agentic frameworks.
Technical Proficiency: Linux system administration, DevOps principles, Docker.  Comfortable with technology; strength in *application* and user-centric aspects.

projects.name: ImpactDB
projects.description: Creator of ImpactDatabase.org, an open data publishing site supporting nonprofit organizations with data collection, preparation, publication, and visualization.

awards: 50 Best B2B SaaS Freelance Writers – Software World Research

ai_interests_and_preferences.output_management: Strong belief in the value of managing and utilizing AI outputs for their contextual information.
ai_interests_and_preferences.personalized_rag: Advocate for small, curated, user-owned datasets for personalizing AI experiences.
ai_interests_and_preferences.ai_memory_workflow_and_tooling: Interest in AI memory solutions (e.g., Letta, MemGPT) and the broader AI ecosystem, including agentic workflows and orchestration (MCP).  Notes a lack of usability focus in many existing tools.
ai_interests_and_preferences.ai_for_good: Passionate about using AI to address practical needs and improve lives.
ai_interests_and_preferences.idea_generation: Values AI's capabilities for brainstorming and generating ideas.

preferred_work_environment.location: Based in Jerusalem. Hybrid/in-office for Israeli opportunities; remote for international opportunities.
preferred_work_environment.engagement: Open to full-time employment, contract work with stable clients, or establishing a consultancy.  Prioritizes work alignment.
